titles.title: Real MEAT Act of 2019
Real Marketing Edible Artificials Truthfully Act of 2019
Real MEAT Act of 2019

A bill to amend the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act to ensure that consumers can make informed decisions in choosing between meat products such as beef and imitation meat products, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions
